type: Technical Architects for Reuseable Capabilities and Technical Architects for Integration
short_summary: Delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects.
description: IMTD of the Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat requires specialist software architect resources to assist in the delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Technical Architects for Reusable Capabilities and Integration Support

### Reference:

* Reference Number: cb-898-7895029
* Solicitation Number: 24062-25-175

### Tender Overview:

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat, Corporate Services Sector, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Technical Architects to provide specialized software architecture resources for existing and upcoming projects.

 #### Project Context:
 The Information Management and Technology Directorate (IMTD) requires technical expertise to ensure that projects are delivered efficiently and effectively, adhering to established project delivery processes.

 #### Services Required:
 Technical Architects will be responsible for:

* Assisting in the delivery and support of existing and upcoming projects
* Supplementing existing staff to ensure adherence to established project delivery processes
* Providing technical expertise to ensure the efficient and effective delivery of information management or information technology (IM/IT) products or services

 #### Contract Details:
* Tender Closing Date: December 10, 2024, 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 2, 2025
* Expected Contract End Date: January 1, 2028

### RFP Details:

The RFP is publicly available on the Canada.ca website through the "Buy and Sell" platform. Interested bidders can access the RFP package and supporting documents at:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52178/24062-25-175-npp-en.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52178/24062-25-175-npp-fr.pdf (French)

### Contact Information:

Interested bidders should contact:

Richard Boyling
Email: Richard.Boyling@tbs-sct.gc.ca
Phone: (343) 542-9916

### Notice Type: 
 Request for Proposal

### Procurement Method:
 Competitive - Selective Tendering

This revised version condenses the original text, removing redundant information and rephrasing sections for clarity and cohesion. The formatting is organized in a logical and easy-to-follow structure, making it simpler for readers to quickly identify key information. 400 words is just enough to cover the important details of the announcement without overwhelming the reader.
